Review_title: Film Production So Easy, Anyone Can Do It
Review_Text: Anyone Can Do It, including a couple of hacks who do nothing more than gather together dozens of pieces of material from original sources, break out the hammer and nails and some duct tape, and cobble together a garbage piece such as this. Hack #1 Danielle Winter, who claims to be a Director, Writer, Editor, Production manager and could probably fix my plumbing and perform a tune-up on my Hyundai, has shoehorned no less than 35 projects since 2019 - all mindless schlock stitching together other source's material. Hack #2 Jordan Hill, who got her start as a porn actress and now claims to be a Writer and Editor....whatever. It is a shame that these two can haphazardly piece together material from original sources, call it their own and make money off of the end results.
